section.name: Introduction
section.p: Mindquarry has an easy to use web-interface and a zero-install desktop client, but under the hood powerful open source software components and applications are used.

subsection.name: This Site
subsection.p: This site provides an overview of resources valuable for developers of Mindquarry (this could be you) and developers that wish to use Mindquarry's components in their systems, which is possible thanks to Mindquarry's open source license (Mozilla Public License)
